name: Celestial Phoenix
text_description: The Celestial Phoenix, a being of pure Spirit energy, has the ability to resurrect a defeated ally once per game. When this incredible creature is defeated, it can choose another fallen ally to bring back to the game with half of its original HP.
illustration_description: The card shows a breathtaking phoenix soaring above the clouds, its body radiating a mesmerizing golden light. It leaves a trail of spirit energy that gives the impression of a star-studded tail. Below, a fantasy landscape stretches out bathed in twilight.
